quote: Weight loss doesn't begin in the gym with a dumbbell; it starts in your head with a decision.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Weight loss requires determination, consistency and hard work
author: Invajy

quote: You aren't fat. You have fat. Fat does not define you.
author: Anonymous

quote: Weight loss surgery isn't going to make you lose weight; it's a tool to help you lose weight. Half of it is the surgery, and half of it is you eating what you're supposed to eat and exercising.
author: Ashley Nell Tipton

quote: There's a huge emotional component to weight loss.
author: Carnie Wilson

quote: If you believe that weight loss requires self-deprivation, I'm going to teach you otherwise.
author: Robert Atkins

quote: Workout till you feel that pain and soreness in muscles. This one is a good pain. No pain, no gain.
author: Invajy

quote: While weight loss is important, what's more important is the quality of food you put in your body - food is information that quickly changes your metabolism and genes.
author: Mark Hyman

quote: Work hard and train your body in a way that it becomes inspiration and competition for others.
author: Invajy

quote: The journey to stronger muscles passes through sore muscles.
author: Invajy

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The distance between who I am and who I want to be is only separated by what I do!
author: Anonymous

quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
author: Anonymous

quote: Someone busier than you is running right now.
author: Anonymous

quote: Working out is never convenient. But neither is illness, diabetes and obesity!
author: Anonymous

quote: If you wait, all that happens is you get older.
author: Larry McMurtry

quote: To ensure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.
author: William Londen

quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
author: Anonymous

quote: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
author: Nikki Rogers

quote: Sweat is fat crying.
author: Anonymous

quote: Eat responsibly. You don't have to be a saint with your food, but you can't eat like every day is thanksgiving either.
author: Brad Pilon

quote: Think of your workouts as important meetings you've scheduled with yourself. Bosses don't cancel.
author: Anonymous

quote: I always believed if you take care of your body it will take care of you.
author: Ted Lindsay

quote: It is better to take small steps in the right direction than to make a great leap forward only to stumble backward.
author: Proverb

quote: To change your body you must first change your mind.
author: Anonymous

quote: I don't stop when I'm tired, I stop when I'm DONE!
author: Anonymous

quote: I don't work hard because I hate my body. I workout because I love it!
author: Anonymous

quote: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!
author: Anonymous

quote: When it burns, is when you're just getting started. That's when you get stronger!
author: Anonymous

quote: If you have 30 minutes for Facebook, you have 1 hour for the gym!
author: Anonymous

quote: If it was about knowledge, we would all be skinny and rich. It's not about what you know but what you do!
author: Anonymous

quote: Fitness is like marriage, you can't cheat on it and expect it to work.
author: Bonnie Pfiester

quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
author: Gene Tunney

quote: Even if you are on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.
author: Marvin Phillips

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Walking: the most ancient exercise and still the best modern exercise.
author: Carrie Latet

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Every day, in every way, I am getting better and better.
author: Emilie Coue

quote: Just believe in yourself. Even if you don't, pretend that you do and, at some point, you will.
author: Venus Williams

quote: The best way to predict your health is to create it.
author: Anonymous

quote: You can't run from all your problems, but it will help you lose weight.
author: Anonymous

quote: Get started as if you are motivated. Pretend. And the motivation will come!
author: Anonymous

quote: Excuses don't burn calories.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don't stop until you're proud.
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm not running a marathon or a 5K. I have no upcoming competitions and I don't plan on going to the beach. I am working out like my life depends on it. Because it does!
author: Anonymous

quote: Make time for it. Just get it done. Nobody ever got strong or got in shape by thinking about it. They did it.
author: Jim Wendler

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says. Keep going. You can!
author: Anonymous

quote: Those who think they have not time for bodily exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
author: Edward Stanley

quote: The only successful way to reach and maintain a healthy weight is to find what works for you.
author: Anonymous

quote: Getting my lifelong weight struggle under control has come from a process of treating myself as well as I treat others in every way.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Don't compare yourself to others. Compare yourself to the person from yesterday.
author: Anonymous

quote: A huge part of losing weight is believing you can do it and realizing it's not going to happen overnight.
author: Anonymous

quote: The hardest step to fitness is the first. Take it now!
author: Heather Montgomery

quote: Your body can do anything. It's your mind that needs convincing
author: Anonymous

quote: Your goals are as good as your actions. No action taken, no goals achieved.
author: Derric Yuh Ndim

quote: If you have discipline, drive, and determination... nothing is impossible.
author: Dana Linn Bailey

quote: Eliminate the mindset of can't... because you can do anything.
author: Toni Horton

quote: Some people want it to happen. Some wish it would happen. Others make it happen.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Exercise should be regarded as a tribute to the heart.
author: Gene Tunney

quote: If you don't do what's best for your body, you're the one who comes up on the short end.
author: Julius Erving

quote: When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you keep good food in your fridge, you will eat good food.
author: Errick McAdams

quote: You don't have to go fast, you just have to go.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you're tired of starting over; stop giving up!
author: Anonymous

quote: On the other side of your workout is the body and health you want!
author: Anonymous

quote: The question isn't can you, it's will you!
author: Anonymous

quote: Workouts are like life. The harder it is, the STRONGER YOU BECOME!
author: Anonymous

quote: If no one thinks you can, then you have to!
author: Anonymous

quote: If you still look good at the end of your workout... you didn't work hard enough!
author: Anonymous

quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
author: Mary Pickford

quote: Triumph by putting a little soul into it!
author: Nancy Mure

quote: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons
author: Jim Rohn

quote: We are what we repeatedly do; therefore excellence is not merely an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Whatever you're meant to do, do it now. The conditions are always impossible.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: If you only do what is easy, you will always remain weak.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: To think is easy. To act is hard. But the hardest thing in the world is to act in accordance with your thinking.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: You must tell yourself, no matter how hard it is, or how hard it gets, I'm going to make it.
author: Anonymous

quote: To lose weight permanently requires faith - faith there is a bigger life waiting for you beyond food and weight.
author: Catherine L. Taylor

quote: Results happen over time, not overnight. Work hard, stay consistent and be patient.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
author: Luis Galarza

quote: Good habits are as addictive as bad habits. But far more rewarding.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
author: Bethenny Frankel

quote: There are only two options regarding commitment; you're either in or you're out. There's no such thing as life in-between.
author: Pat Riley

quote: Everything you can imagine about how you will look and feel when you lose weight is real.
author: Felicity Luckey

quote: The empowering thought is that busy hands cannot eat!
author: Nancy Mure

quote: A high functioning palate allows you to live without sugar and salt.
author: Nancy Mure

quote: First step to lose weight. Get and stay active!
author: Josheel Dole

quote: Your body is not just yours. It is a gift and a responsibility.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Our eyes are meant to show us food when we are hungry, not to make us hungry when we see food.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Weight loss is not impossible. Weight loss is hard, but hard is not the same as impossible.
author: Anonymous

quote: All you need are a pair of tennis shoes and motivation to change the course of your life.
author: Heidi Bond

quote: Eat clean to stay fit, have a burger to stay sane.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: If you take care of your body, it'll take care of you.
author: Usher

quote: For me, exercise is more than just physical... it's therapeutic.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Dieting is the only game where you win when you lose!
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Fitness: If it came in a bottle, everybody would have a great body.
author: Cher

quote: Ask yourself, 'Am I really hungry, or am I having this because it looks good?'
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: It's all about reading labels and being aware and conscious of what goes in.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: It was basically just portion control, and 'I don't need it,' I was just shoving everything into my mouth.
author: John Goodman

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: For me, getting enough sleep, drinking lots of water, having a healthy diet, and staying away from alcohol are musts. It's so boring, I know, but doing those things really helps.
author: Jessica Biel

quote: For me, it's just eat whatever makes you feel good.
author: Jessica Simpson

quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: I don't want to be skinny. I'm constantly in a state of self-improvement, but I don't beat myself up over it.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I'm not trying to lose weight. I'm trying to get rid of it. I have no intention of finding it again.
author: Anonymous

quote: Moderation. Small helpings. Sample a little bit of everything. These are the secrets of happiness and good health.
author: Julia Child

quote: I just think you should eat less of everything. A little bit less. I don't want to live a life where you can't have what you want; it just makes you want it more.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: When I lost my weight and kept it off, it's when I lost it slowly. I know that expression 'the turtle wins the race'. Now I know that if I lose weight in a healthy way, I keep it off.
author: Khloe Kardashian
